Dear Travelers,

V1.4 Invitation of Windblume has been released! Time to enjoy the Windblume Festival! The Guide Contest has also started. Travelers contributing outstanding guides will receive abundant rewards!

'''Invitation of Windblume Guide Contest''' is an web [[event]] in [[Version 1.4]].

==How to Participate==
#To participate in the event, please post your guide post in [https://www.hoyolab.com/topicDetail/71 #Guides & Walkthroughs#]  (on the official forums) and include "[V1.4 Guide]" in the title. You are more likely to win a prize if the guide is related to the new contents of V1.4 (characters, events, etc.);
#Please include your in-game UID at the beginning of your guide and make sure it is correct (otherwise you will miss the prize even if you win one).
;Example
UID 987654321<br>...<br>(Content)<br>...

==Event Reward==
Gold Prize (5 winners)
*Primogem ×6,000 + Reward worth $100
Silver Prize (10 winners)
*Primogem ×2,000 + Reward worth $40
Bronze Prize (20 winners)
*Primogem ×1,000 + Reward worth $25

==Event Time==
*Contribution Period: 3/17 12:00 - 4/25 23:59 (UTC+8)
*Evaluation Period: 4/26 0:00 - 5/11 23:59 (UTC+8)
*Result Announcement Date: after 5/12

==Requirements==
#Post Requirements
##"[V1.4 Guide]" must be included in the title of your post;
##Your post must be posted within the contribution period (3/17 12:00 - 4/25 23:59  (UTC+8));
##Your post must be posted in #Guides & Walkthroughs#.
#*Posts that fail to follow these requirements will not be qualified.
#Content Requirements
##Your guide must be both literally and visually useful. There must be at least 5 pictures (max size for each: 10MB). P.S. Each post can hold up to 50 pictures;
##The content of your guide must fit the title. The whole post must have a clean layout and strong logic. There must not be any factual error or plagiarism;
##You may add GIFs or videos to make your guide even more readable, which will further improve your rating to some extent.
#*P.S. If a video over 3 minutes long with an audio or literal commentary is added, you will no longer be required to attach pictures. The video itself must be your original work and you must include "This is a contribution to the Guide Contest of HoYoLAB. Post link:..." in the intro, otherwise it will be deemed as plagiarism.
